resources.string:
Hello, my name is Charles. 

I love technology and writing. 

Writing was one of my very first loves of life. I also, became enamored with technology as a teen. 

Fun fact is that I have wrote thousands of songs and poems. 

As a teen, I used to write multiple songs a day. 

I have a Bachelors Degree in App Development. 

Currently, I am taking the Android Kotlin Developer at Udacity. 

In my spare time, I practice learning how to develop various apps to hone my skills.
